description: This file defines a repository interface for managing Conversation entities in a Spring Data JPA context, enabling CRUD operations and a custom query method for retrieving conversations by passenger ID with pagination and ordering.

classes.name: ConversationRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for Conversation entities, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and a custom query method.

methods.name: findByPassengerIdOrderByUpdatedAtDesc
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of Conversation entities filtered by passenger ID, ordered by the 'updatedAt' timestamp in descending order.
